title: Xi Jinping Now Holds Near-Absolute Power in China, Creating Risks
description: Xi Jinping has created a new ruling elite packed with loyalist officials primed to elevate his agenda of bolstering national security and of turning China into a technological great power.
dc:creator: Chris Buckley, Keith Bradsher and Chang Che
category: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
media:description: President Xi Jinping, left, with new members of the Politburo Standing Committee at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on Sunday.
